00034 #include "TokenManager.hh"
00035 #include "Assembly.hh"
00036 
00037 #include <PLASMA/TokenVariable.hh>
00038 
00039 using namespace TREX::europa;
00040 
00041 
00042 /*
00043  * class TREX::europa::TokenManager
00044  */
00045 
00046 // structors 
00047 
00048 TokenManager::TokenManager(Assembly const &assembly) 
00049   :EUROPA::PlanDatabaseListener(assembly.plan_db()), 
00050    m_assembly(assembly) {}
00051 
00052 TokenManager::~TokenManager() {}
00053 
00054 // manipulators 
00055 
00056 void TokenManager::process_pending(EUROPA::IntervalIntDomain const &scope) {
00057   EUROPA::TokenSet pending;
00058   std::swap(pending, m_pending);
00059 
00060   for(EUROPA::TokenSet::const_iterator t=pending.begin();
00061       pending.end()!=t; ++t) {
00062     if( m_assembly.isIgnored(*t) ) {
00063       debugMsg("trex:token", "IGNORE "<<(*t)->toString()<<": "
00064                                       <<(*t)->getPredicateName().toString());
00065     } else {      
00066       EUROPA::TokenId master = (*t)->master();
00067       
00068       if( master.isNoId() ) {
00069         if( (*t)->getState()->baseDomain().isMember(EUROPA::Token::REJECTED) ) {
00070           // It is a goal : add it to the list of my objectives
00071           debugMsg("trex:token", "GOAL "<<(*t)->toString()<<": "
00072                    <<(*t)->getPredicateName().toString());
00073           m_goals.insert(*t);
00074           (*t)->start()->restrictBaseDomain(scope);
00075         }
00076       }
00077       if( (*t)->isInactive() ) {
00078         add_to_agenda(*t);
00079       }
00080     }
00081   }
00082 }
00083 
00084 void TokenManager::add_to_agenda(EUROPA::TokenId const &token) {
00085   m_pending.erase(token);
00086   if( token->isFact() )
00087     m_facts_agenda.insert(token);
00088   else 
00089     m_agenda.insert(token);
00090 }
00091 
00092 void TokenManager::remove_from_agenda(EUROPA::TokenId const &token) {
00093   if( token->isFact() ) 
00094     m_facts_agenda.erase(token);
00095   else
00096     m_agenda.erase(token);
00097 }
00098 
00099 
00100 // europa callbacks
00101 
00102 void TokenManager::notifyAdded(EUROPA::TokenId const &token) {
00103   m_pending.insert(token);
00104 }
00105 
00106 void TokenManager::notifyRemoved(EUROPA::TokenId const &token) {
00107   m_pending.erase(token);
00108   remove_from_agenda(token);
00109 }
00110 
00111 void TokenManager::notifyActivated(EUROPA::TokenId const &token) {
00112   remove_from_agenda(token);
00113 }
00114 
00115 void TokenManager::notifyDeactivated(EUROPA::TokenId const &token) {
00116   add_to_agenda(token);
00117 }
00118 
00119 void TokenManager::notifyMerged(EUROPA::TokenId const &token) {
00120   remove_from_agenda(token);
00121 }
00122 
00123 void TokenManager::notifySplit(EUROPA::TokenId const &token) {
00124   add_to_agenda(token);
00125 }
00126 
00127 void TokenManager::notifyCommitted(EUROPA::TokenId const &token) {
00128   
00129 }
00130 
00131 void TokenManager::notifyRejected(EUROPA::TokenId const &token) {
00132   remove_from_agenda(token);
00133 }
00134 
00135 void TokenManager::notifyTerminated(EUROPA::TokenId const &token) {
00136   remove_from_agenda(token);
00137 }
